dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 5145 IH: Close Tax Loopholes That Outsource American Jobs Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. DeLauro introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to eliminate tax preferences for foreign profits by repealing the reduced rate of tax on foreign-derived intangible income and global intangible low-taxed income.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Close Tax Loopholes That Outsource American Jobs Act.

section.header: Repeal of reduced rate of tax on foreign-derived intangible income and global intangible low-taxed income

subsection.text: Part VIII of subchapter B of chapter 1 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking section 250 (and by striking the item relating to such section in the table of sections of such part).

paragraph.text: Section 172(d) of such Code is amended by striking paragraph (9).
Section 246(b)(1) of such Code is amendedâ€”

subparagraph.text: by striking subsection (a) and (b) of section 245, and section 250 and inserting and subsection (a) and (b) of section 245; and
by striking subsection (a) and (b) of section 245, and 250 and inserting and subsection (a) and (b) of section 245.

paragraph.text: Section 469(i)(3)(F)(iii) of such Code is amended by striking 222, and 250 and inserting and 222.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2017.
